access: Access to back and front yard
description:
This totally remodeled 1 bedroom has an ultra bath, state of the art kitchen with built-in 42" fridge, DW, granite counter top, W&D, huge living & dining rooms with hardwood floor, lots of closets, 2 parking spots, minutes walk to Randhurst Mall.

This 1000 sf apartment can host up to 4 guests comfortably , thanks to the sofa bed in the living room and huge sectional sofa with ottomans in 17x20 living room. It also has a luxurious kitchen with 42"build in fridge and granite counter top 13x13 big kitchen plus side island for breakfast and 8x10 dining area.  Also this place has a built in iron board , and a lots of closets and storage,  and finally it has a W&D inside the apartment just next to euro bathroom .The whole apartment has been totally remodeled a year ago.

Access to back and front yard

The landlord lives just 20 min away , so he is available to answer all guests needs in less than an hour .

This unique apartment located in the heart of prestigious suburb of Mount Prospect with 5 min walking to Randhurst mall , Shopping , Restaurants , and movie theater , 15 min away from O'Hare airport and 5 min away from Mt. prospect Metra train station

The apartment is 5 min drive to Metra train station , and 15 min to the airport .

This one of kind apartment has its own heating and air condition , so the guests can control the temperature according to their convenient .

description:
Thank you for looking at our home.
The bedroom is located on the second floor.
Full size bed and shared bathroom.
Free Guest Parking and WiFi
8 miles north from O'Hare International Airport
20 miles northwest from downtown Chicago
2.4 miles away from the Des Plaines Metra Train Station which takes you downtown Chicago
0.2 mile from 208 Pace Bus Stop
Next to I-294 Interstate Highway
0.2 mile from 60 mile Des Plaines River Trail
7 miles from Fashion Outlets Of Chicago
5.2 miles from Rivers Casino

There is free guest parking here at our Townhouse complex. The Des Plaines Metra Train Station is 2.4 miles away. This takes you downtown Chicago to the Ogilvie Transportation Center. Parking at the Des Plaines Metra Station is $1.50 a day.

additional_house_rules:
House Rules

1. Reservations require a $400 security deposit that is not charged in advance.

2. Guests can cancel free of charge within 24 hours of booking (please contact us to process the refund). You’ll be charged 50% of the booking price (minus the service fee) if you cancel more than seven days before arrival, and 100% of the total price if you cancel within seven days of arrival.

3. Check-in is at 4 pm. Checkout is at 11 am. Early check-in or late checkout may be available upon request. Guests who stay beyond their designated checkout time or delay our housekeeping staff are liable for any associated costs and expenses.

4. Guests are not allowed to make a reservation in their city of residence. Please contact us if you're booking within your city.

5. Smoking, parties, and excessive noise are not allowed, including on balconies and in shared spaces. Smoking violations are subject to a $250 fine plus the cost to clean, deodorize, and repair damages.

6. Commercial photography/videography without written consent, Illegal activity, prostitution, and possession of firearms is strictly prohibited.

7. Overnight guests that exceed the number stated in the reservation are not allowed.

8. Pets are not allowed. Violation of our pet policy may result in a fine. We encourage guests with service animals to contact us before their stay.

9. Guests are responsible for covering the cost to replace lost keys, key cards, fobs, or parking passes.

10. Sonder properties may use video surveillance in public areas. Noise detecting technology may be used inside the suite to monitor excessive noise levels. 

11. Guests take full responsibility for damages, injury, or loss that occur on the premises and its facilities. Guests must report any property damage to customer service. Unreported damages will be deducted from the security deposit.

12. Booking a reservation constitutes an agreement to comply with the House Rules. Guests who violate these rules are liable for any associated damages, fees, costs, or expenses.

description:
Featured in The New York Times, The Wall Street Journal, and Fast Company, we’ve hosted over 350k guests in 2,500+ spaces with an average rating of 4.6 stars. Each space is designed and run by us, so you’ll always know what to expect from your stay. At Sonder, we’ve combined the best parts of home and hotel.

- 24/7 support via text, email, or phone
- Coffee, fresh towels, and bathroom essentials provided
- Hotel-standard cleaning before you arrive
- Self check-in

- Fully-equipped kitchen
- In-suite laundry

Building amenities
- Rooftop patio
- Fitness center
- Club room

South Loop highlights
- Walkability score: 98
- 8 minute walk to Lou Malnati's Pizzeria (classic Chicago-style pizza restaurant)
- 10 minute walk to Buddy Guy's Legends (blues club with great cocktails)

Getting around
- 5 minute walk to LaSalle subway station
- .7 mile walk to Grant Park
- 50 minute drive to ORD Airport

The South Loop is a vibrant blend of notable attractions, beautiful parks, and stunning Lake Michigan views. Picnic in the charming green space surrounding Museum Campus, or attend one of the many events at Grant Park such as The Taste of Chicago. Spend the day exploring the countless museums, or journey to the top of the 108-story Willis Tower for breathtaking views of the city.

There are 7 steps once inside the building to get to the area with elevators.

There’s no cable. We’ve provided an HDMI cord for streaming.

The bedroom walls do not extend to the ceiling.

This is a central location and prone to noise.
house_rules:
House Rules

1. Reservations require a $400 security deposit that is not charged in advance.

2. Guests can cancel free of charge within 24 hours of booking (please contact us to process the refund). You’ll be charged 50% of the booking price (minus the service fee) if you cancel more than seven days before arrival, and 100% of the total price if you cancel within seven days of arrival.

3. Check-in is at 4 pm. Checkout is at 11 am. Early check-in or late checkout may be available upon request. Guests who stay beyond their designated checkout time or delay our housekeeping staff are liable for any associated costs and expenses.

4. Guests are not allowed to make a reservation in their city of residence. Please contact us if you're booking within your city.

5. Smoking, parties, and excessive noise are not allowed, including on balconies and in shared spaces. Smoking violations are subject to a $250 fine plus the cost to clean, deodorize, and repair damages.

6. Commercial photography/videography without written consent, Illegal activity, prostitution, and possession of firearms is strictly prohibited.

7. Overnight guests that exceed the number stated in the reservation are not allowed.

8. Pets are not allowed. Violation of our pet policy may result in a fine. We encourage guests with service animals to contact us before their stay.

9. Guests are responsible for covering the cost to replace lost keys, key cards, fobs, or parking passes.

10. Sonder properties may use video surveillance in public areas. Noise detecting technology may be used inside the suite to monitor excessive noise levels. 

11. Guests take full responsibility for damages, injury, or loss that occur on the premises and its facilities. Guests must report any property damage to customer service. Unreported damages will be deducted from the security deposit.

12. Booking a reservation constitutes an agreement to comply with the House Rules. Guests who violate these rules are liable for any associated damages, fees, costs, or expenses.

Spend the day exploring the countless museums, or journey to the top of the 108-story Willis Tower for breathtaking views of the city.

description:
2 bedroom 2 bathroom listing of our entire condo (Normally we rent out just a bedroom and this is listed for 2 people instead of 4). In this case, we will be gone and the whole home is available!

Quality accommodations in the cultural haven that is Pilsen and the Heart of Chicago.

The entire home - living room, kitchen, master bedroom, guest bedroom, two bathrooms, and back deck.

We use this listing when we won't be in the home, so while we may be there to greet you or before you depart, we likely won't be around.

Check the guidebook!

description:
RARE FIND! Seasoned Host, 1 Private Bedroom for rent in a Clean 3bedroom Condo located on 1st floor. Only 15 minute drive to Restaurants & Shopping in downtown Chicago. Close to major expressways. 

My home is perfect for couples, solo adventurers & business travelers. 

Self Check-in available. 

•Free street parking.
•Prívate Parking available (fee).
•WiFi 
•Laundry in building.
•Fully Equipped Kitchen.
•Bathroom Toiletries.  
•Free Coffee/Tea/Water.
•Pets (fee)
*Meals Included (Fee)

description:
Fully furnished luxury 2 bedroom apartment in Lincoln Park next to Wrightwood Park. 
2 bedroom, 1 bathroom with shower, tub & double sink, fireplace, hardwood floors, in unit laundry, fully stocked kitchen and free street parking outside of unit. 
Less than 5 minute walk to many restaurants, coffee shops, Walgreens, Fedex, UPS Store and Chase Bank. Less than 10 minute walk from grocery stores and shopping. Red Line, Brown Line and Purple Line are only 0.8 miles away.
PREFER 4~6 month rental.

1,000 square feet beautiful sunny unit in Lincoln Park across the street from Wrightwood Park. 50" smart TV in the living room with wood burning fireplace, 2 bedrooms with queen size beds and custom closet organizers. Stocked kitchen with granite countertops, garbage disposal unit, hardwood floors, bathroom with shower, tub and double sink, washer and dryer in unit, central heat, a/c, and ceiling fans in each bedroom. High speed internet included along with all cooking utensils, pots and pans, towels, cleaning supplies and bathroom toiletries.   

Parking available without permit, fees or time restrictions on the street directly outside the unit.

Apartment features:

Kitchen with full size stove, oven, microwave, fridge, dishwasher, tea kettle, pots, pans, Tupperware, utensils, dishes, bowls, glasses, mugs and cutlery
Granite countertops
Garbage disposal unit
Crown molding
Hardwood flooring 
New carpeting in bedrooms 
Washer/dryer in unit
Custom window shades
2 queen beds with fresh bedding, extra pillows & sheets
3 ceiling fans 
Both tub and shower in bathroom with double sink
Lots of towels, linens, paper towels, toilet paper, soaps, shampoo, conditioner and body wash, etc. 
50” smart flat screen TV, fast WIFI, Roku and cable
Dining room table and 2 chairs 
Sofa and coffee table 
Large mirrors
Clothing organizers
Dressers

Available 24/7 to answer questions.

Less than 5 minute walk to many restaurants such as Chipotle, Taco Bell, Subway, McDonald’s, Wendy’s and Jet’s Pizza, coffee shops such as Starbucks and Dunkin’ Donuts and Walgreens, Fedex, UPS Store and Chase Bank. 

Less than 10 minute walk from grocery stores such as Aldi, Jewel-Osco, Mariano’s Market, farmer’s market, Whole Foods , Costco, shopping like Marshall, Old Navy, TJ Maxx and Office Max. 

Less than 15 minutes walk to Regal Cinemas. 

Several studios and gyms, bars, nail salons, hair salons, multiple dry cleaners, tailors, banks, spas, juice shops, churches, schools and much more all within walking distance.

Public transportation Red Line, Brown Line and Purple Line only 0.8 miles away. Blue Line only 1.3 miles away. Several bus routes stop right at corner. 

Car sharing is available from Zipcar, RelayRides, I-GO and Getaround and bike rentals all within 10 minute walk.

Garbage must be taken out of door in backyard and placed into respective garbage bin or recycling bin and door locked after, no garbage of any kind including bottles/ cans may be left in front or back yard. No loitering in the front or back yard, there is Wrightwood Park right across the street for activities. Please be careful when opening/ closing front gate or back door so neighbors dogs do not accidentally run out.

access: You'll have full access to the entire apartment, an inviting front porch with chairs for warm evenings and an enormous yard if you want to spend some time outdoors on the property during your stay.
description:
Comfort of home minutes from the heart of Lincoln Square. Lincoln Ave. offers almost a mile of trendy bars, hip restaurants, boutiques, music arts and crafts.  Head East to beautiful Lake Shore Drive and Foster Beach. South to Wrigley Field, Downtown, Museums, the Water Tower, the Gold Coast, etc. North to Chicago's beautiful North Shore and its miles of bike trails and forest preserves. For your shopping convenience only 2 miles away you will find  the Lincolnwood Mall.

The apartment has 2 bedrooms. The first has a full bed and the second has full size beds.  It provides comfortable sleeping arrangements for adults and adults with children alike. Kitchen is set up as a light breakfast station with tea and coffee. Appliances provided include a coffee maker, a refrigerator, a microwave and a toaster oven. Parking in back of building

You'll have full access to the entire apartment, an inviting front porch with chairs for warm evenings and an enormous yard if you want to spend some time outdoors on the property during your stay.

Right in between Ravenswood and Lincoln Square. Lots of restaurants, bars, boutiques and wide open green spaces to explore.

CTA buses are at the corner of the block.

access: Backyard
description:
Nearby:
-McCormick Place
-Soldier Field(Bears)
-Grant Park
-South Loop
-Guaranteed Rate Field(White Sox)
-Toyota Park(Fire)
-UIC
-5 minutes from Chinatown

24h free street parking, wide backyard, bus stop right in front that can take you anywhere in the city.

2 Queen Beds, futon, bathroom,
Fridge, microwave, tv
Kitchen. 

Check in after 2pm. 
Check out before 11am. 
See SELF CHECK-IN INSTRUCTIONS. 
Earlier check in or later check out times can be requested.
No refunds after check-in.

This place is a full apartment with a kitchen, bathroom, 2 bedrooms, futon, and large backyard.
Please see self check-in instructions in the confirmed guest resources. If you can't see them on the app, it is shown more prominently when viewing on a computer.

Rules:
1. No parties
2. Shoes off when you enter. 
3. Weekday quiet hours after 10pm. Weekend quiet hours after 11pm. 
4. Request permission before checking in early or checking out late. Additional charges may apply.

Backyard

We take a very hands off approach to hosting. As guests, you'll be checking in and out by yourselves and will have your own private place. 

As hosts, we are very available as we live in the house right next door. We are quick in answering and addressing any questions and needs you may have. Feel free to ask us anything about the city or if you have any other needs!

5 minutes from Chinatown, great restaurants everywhere!
Close to South Loop, McCormick Place, Soldier Field, Grant Park, UIC as well. 
Street parking is plentiful as well! If you can't find a spot, let me know and I'll find one for you.

It is very easy to get around. You can take the bus which is right in front of the building and transfer to any train to get around anywhere in the city. 

If you prefer, you can drive as well. There are plenty of parking spots in the area. Let me know if you can't find a spot to park your car. 

There are also divvy bikes, Chicago's public bicycle system.

- No shoes in the house

description:
A cute and clean private bedroom in a light filled and spacious 3 bedroom apartment! The bedroom has a brand new queen sized bed with 12 inch memory foam mattress. Both the bathroom and a kitchen have been recently remodeled. The bedroom has its own lock with a key. Wifi is abundant throughout the apartment. There is a full kitchen available.

My place is right across to Douglas Park and a block away from Lagunitas Brewery and 4 Blocks to the California Pink Line Station. It takes 20 mins to the Loop by the Pink Line. A walking distance to Pete's Fresh Market and WalMart also is a great convenience.

access: Guests have keys to the house. They can come and go as they like, and keep any hours they wish.
description:
Enjoy multi-cultural women's residence w/your own bedroom, share common rooms. full kitchen access w/everything needed to cook. outside deck, parking out front. gardens. doggies to greet you. manager lives on site. lots of art on display! public transportation 2 blocks away!

Women's Residence is located at 1957 S. Spaulding Ave. corner of 21st , just 2 blocks west of the Kedzie stop on pink line. 116 year old red brick house with large flower gardens. 1st floor is art gallery, office, extra bedroom for guests, and manager's rooms. Lower level is art studio and laundry area. 2nd floor is women's residence with 3 bedrooms, living room, bathroom, and kitchen with outside deck off kitchen in back of house. The entire place is totally furnished with furniture, linens, dishes, etc. Just need your clothing & toothbrush for a room of your own! All guests may use common rooms! Everyone is screened to stay at this quiet, unique place. We have a daily rate of $45.00 for short stays and monthly rate for $550.00. More than one woman per room is extra.  Women who stay more than one month sign a rental agreement and pay a security deposit equal to a month's rent. Women receive keys and come and go as they like.
The live-in manager has 2 dogs that stay with her on first floor. They do not go up to 2nd floor at all. There is plenty of art everywhere and all rooms are colorful. The bedroom names are- Even Cowgirls Get the Blues, Florence Comfy Room, Bette Midler Rm., and Paris Room.
Public transportation is close in all 4 directions, travel to plenty of stores to shop for groceries, and more. www.urbanartretreat.com

Guests have keys to the house. They can come and go as they like, and keep any hours they wish.

I am mostly in office. When I am not seen, I am retreating to my room with my dogs to relax. I am mostly in the background. If you need me, you can go to the open office doorway. There is a large brass bell in front hall to ring for emergencies.

This is a residential, mostly African American neighborhood. We know each other. There is a feeling of spaciousness and real life here. Plenty of families, children, and old folks in this area. People say hello on the sidewalks when they pass each other! 
It is easy to walk around here. Plenty to walk to and do. We are close to the large Douglas Park. It has a cultural center with lots to do including in the summer a large outdoor swimming pool.
It is easy to catch a Cermak bus one block away and go to Chinatown and have fun looking around. It is easy to catch the pink line train 2 blocks away and go downtown where there are million things to do- many are free! The nearby park has a lagoon and fishing and bird watching- all free! United Center for games and events is extremely close.
We have a lot of trees in the neighborhood. We border a Latino neighborhood so walking distance to lots of great Mexican food and art!

2 blocks from pink line train stop called Kedzie.
One block from Cermak bus that goes to Chinatown!
Can easily go downtown from here!

4 bedrooms, 3 on 2nd floor with sitting room, full kitchen, full bathroom, outside deck. One bedroom is on first floor of of the office. The Even Cowgirls Get the Blues bedroom is one of 3 bedrooms on the 2nd floor. It is the only single bedroom, sometimes rented out along with the sitting room, it is attached to.
house_rules: Respect privacy of others, clean up after yourself, once a week each resident staying for longer than one week does a major cleaning of a chore. Attend periodic house mtg.s  Don't come in drunk and knocking things over!  We have written house rules.
interaction: I am mostly in office. When I am not seen, I am retreating to my room with my dogs to relax. I am mostly in the background. If you need me, you can go to the open office doorway. There is a large brass bell in front hall to ring for emergencies.

additional_house_rules:
Only the registered guests are allowed in the apartment. Absolutely no unauthorized guests or visitors. Parties are not permitted.

Please keep all doors locked at all times. Do not exit via rear door unless there is an emergency. 

Grill is not available for use by guests.

Please feel free to use the kitchen, just clean dishes or fill the dishwasher before leaving.

Reservations must be by guest of 25 years of age or older.

This is a non-smoking building. Smoking or vaping is not allowed in the apartment or any areas of the building. If you need to smoke, please do so outdoors away from doors and windows and dispose of cigarette butts appropriately. Fines and forfeiture of security deposit for butts found and smell of smoke or cannibus left in the apartment.

Reserved parking must be paid 7 days before check-in.

Makeup: use tissues to remove makeup. Any towels destroyed by makeup will be charged at $10 per towel.

access: Enjoy watching the neighborhood go by in the front yard or on the front porch. Fold up bag chairs inside the front foyer.
description:
Urban cool Victorian in Chicago’s Popular Lakeview neighborhood:
*private parking 
*close to Lake Michigan, shopping, Vic Theatre, Belmont Theatre District and Wrigley Field Winter Wonderland
*bright third floor penthouse 
*recently upgraded kitchen
*walk to any of the neighborhood's many fab restaurants
*yard and front porch
*Convenient to public transportation-be in the Loop in 15 minutes

This is a penthouse unit. Top floor, baby! Skylights and big windows in the kitchen/dining/living room make this a bright, comfy urban space. Large bedroom with queen bed, desk and tv down a hallway offers privacy.

Enjoy watching the neighborhood go by in the front yard or on the front porch. Fold up bag chairs inside the front foyer.

Please call, text or email with any questions, anytime.

Just 4 blocks south of Wrigley Field, home of the Chicago Cubs and Winterwonderland, this Lakeview apartment was recently featured on Chicago Architecture Center's Instagram and is walking distance to restaurants, shopping and all Belmont district theaters including the Vic Theatre and Briar Street Theatre. The Belmont L train (Red, Brown and Purple lines) station is a 2 minute walk, providing easy access to the rest of the Windy City. Find out why Money Magazine named our neighborhood as number 3 of its top 10 big city neighborhoods for best places to live

Parking is available, in private lot in rear of building for $5-30/night (varies per event) with reservation, please request so it can be reserved. You really don’t need a car to get around the city via foot, train, bus or bike. Just one block walk to the L trains-red, brown and purple lines. Sheffield Avenue is easy to get a cab, Lyft or Uber. Public share bikes by Divvy are also easily accessed by two stations close to the house.

This home is inhabited by a happy healthy pup when not on Airbnb. He is The Mayor of Sheffield Avenue.

This is a third-floor unit, accessed by 2 1/2 flights of stairs. There is no elevator in the building but the good news is that you can enjoy extra dessert while you stay here.

Exterior cameras are in place for the safety of our full time tenants and guests.

Must be 21 years of age or older to book.

Checkin between 4:00pm-8:00pm or later with host confirmation.
house_rules:
Only the registered guests are allowed in the apartment. Absolutely no unauthorized guests or visitors. Parties are not permitted.

Please keep all doors locked at all times. Do not exit via rear door unless there is an emergency. 

Grill is not available for use by guests.

Please feel free to use the kitchen, just clean dishes or fill the dishwasher before leaving.

Reservations must be by guest of 25 years of age or older.

This is a non-smoking building. Smoking or vaping is not allowed in the apartment or any areas of the building. If you need to smoke, please do so outdoors away from doors and windows and dispose of cigarette butts appropriately. Fines and forfeiture of security deposit for butts found and smell of smoke or cannibus left in the apartment.

Reserved parking must be paid 7 days before check-in.

Makeup: use tissues to remove makeup. Any towels destroyed by makeup will be charged at $10 per towel.

access: You have the entire condo to use. You may also use the outside deck, which is shared among all the condos.
description:
2 bedroom cozy condo located in the hot South Loop area. Next door to the famous Reggies Rock Club, a live music venue with multiple bars and restaurant, just a block and a half from chinatown, 3 blocks from the new Wintrust arena, 5 blocks from McCormick place, and a free shuttle from Reggies away from Soldier Field events and other concerts/events. 2 seperate 2 bedroom units available in the same building, see other listing.

This is a brand new contemporary condo, all new appliances and furniture, and has everything you need during your stay. It is super plush and cozy, plenty of seating on oversized furniture, plenty of extra pillows and blankets, and extra sleeping arangements including a fold down futon in the living room, and a huge sectional that would be comfy for 2. Pots, pans, dishes and utensils are all there for you to cook a meal if you like, but there are also great restaurant options, open late, just downstairs and next door at Reggies (bar, restaurant, music venue) Please keep in mind this is a multi-unit building, and we need to be respectful of our neighbors, so no parties are allowed, no smoking, and no pets.

*****IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR A PLACE TO THROW A PARTY, THIS IS NOT IT!***** parties are shut down immediately, and you will be asked to leave without a refund.

You have the entire condo to use. You may also use the outside deck, which is shared among all the condos.

There is always someone right next door at Reggies that can help you with anything you might need. Someone can show you up to the condo if requested. We respond to messages pretty much 24/7. Security is right next door, and watching the outside all the time. No one will come up to the condo after check in, unless asked, or unless there's a problem.

Great location in the South loop, one of the hottest growing neighborhoods in the city for events, restaurants, the bar scene, conventions, and night life. We are right next door to Reggies Rock Club, one of Chicagos hottest music venues, and 1.5 blocks from Chinatown, 3 blocks from the new Wintrust Arena, 5 blocks from McCormick Place and  Soldier Field, and less than 10 min to Northerly Island, Grant Park, Shedd Aquarium, Adler Planetarium, and beaches. Reggies also has free shuttles to all sports games and big concerts! Also very easy to get anywhere in Chicago on public transportation, a green line stop is right behind the building and red line is 1 block away.

Divvy bike rentals. Private parking for your auto in back for additional fee ($20 per night) Parking in front pay meters ($2 per hour till 10pm, free Sundays) some nearby streets have free parking.
Great location for public transportation, with a green line L stop right behind the building, and a red line L stop 1 block away. There are also may taxis and ubers in the area at all times, and free shuttle rides from Reggies to Soldier Field events, and other concerts and big events. Or just walk to the plethora of options nearby!

* check in time is 4 p.m. Early check-in is not possible unless agreed upon at least one day in advance, we need time to clean the condos after the other guests check out. Luggage may be dropped off next door earlier if need be.

*check out time is 11 a.m. No exceptions, unless agreed upon at least one day in advance. Again, luggage may be left next door if you have a later flight.

* no smoking, no pets, no exceptions

* please keep in mind these condos are next door to Reggies Rock Club. You may be able to hear the live music or the patrons from next door until 2am, but the mornings are very quiet. Unit 2 (this unit) is a bit further away than the others, so it rarely is an issue. 

* just because the bar may be loud, does not mean condos can be loud. There are other condos right next to it.

* we offer a reserved parking space behind the building for an additional $20 per night.
interaction: There is always someone right next door at Reggies that can help you with anything you might need. Someone can show you up to the condo if requested. We respond to messages pretty much 24/7. Security is right next door, and watching the outside all the time. No one will come up to the condo after check in, unless asked, or unless there's a problem.

additional_house_rules:
No smoking( any kind)
No parties allowed at all.
Respect other Airbnb guests, belongings and other rooms.
After 9pm the place has to be quiet so people can rest. 
Checkout is by 10am.
No screaming at anytime.
If you bring anybody please inform us before.
There is video recording in common areas for your own security.
booking for somebody else is not allowed unless agreed before booking
Breaking any rule or doing any illegal activity will end up in a immediate cancellation of your reservation and you will have to leave the place immediately. Our top one priority is our guests’ security! There will be security cameras ON in shared spaces only( living room, kitchen, hallways, entrance of the apartment, exits of the apartment).

access: Kitchen, 2 full bathrooms, 2 living rooms, work space,  free dryer and washer in unit for guests staying +7 days.
description:
Welcome to our lovely home! This place is literally next to Downtown Chicago. The freeway is just one block away so it’s easy to get in&out of the City. Free parking on the street(24/7). It has a train station only 0.5miles(10-12minutes walk) this train goes to Downtown & Airport. best thing! it has a bus stop right by the door of the building. This bus goes to the heart of downtown. Two bathrooms, wiFi, coffee maker, iron, shampoo, towels, everything you might need.

You can use both full bathrooms, kitchen, the living room and everything that we have at this place. In the room you will have a comfy queen size bed, night stand, lamp, iron, iron table, clean towels, clean sheets, comforter. The room has a lock from the outside. We provide WiFi, coffee, shampoo, body soap, hair dryer, hair brush, toilet paper, etc. Free washer and dryer in unit( only for guests staying 7days+)

Kitchen, 2 full bathrooms, 2 living rooms, work space,  free dryer and washer in unit for guests staying +7 days.

We might not meet personally but I’m available 24/7 for you and all your needs. Very easy to reach by text and call.

Very close to downtown and very easy to reach. By train ( blue line station 24/7 only 8 stops - 14minutes on train - to Millenium park ). 25 to Millenium park by bus 7 harrison. 11 minutes by UBER, lyft, vía rate from $5-$11 to go to Millenium park. Only 5minutes away from West Loop one of the nicest areas with a lot of restaurants, bars, clubs, etc. 5minutes to Rush hospital. Good for people coming for interviews. Here in Chicago there is a lot of people who are homeless but you won’t have any issues with them. you might see some people who are homeless around the place because there is a shelter close by but they’re not selling drugs or committing felonies. Neither me nor my guests have had or have witnessed anything dangerous or weird at all.

Free parking in the street 24/7 unlimited parking spots right by the building on left side of the building. You can get here by train, bus, driving or taxi.

The room is private but you will share common areas ( kitchen , living room, and the bathroom/s) with other Airbnb guests. Usually none of this get crowd because most of Airbnb guests are most of the time outside the house knowing the city, in concerts, interviews, etc, and they don’t spend much time in the house. A private apartment in the area usually cost over 120$ p/night plus taxes and fees which is in total almost 200$ p/night ! If you want save some money and being close to downtown, surrounding great public transportation and with free street parking this could be a great option for you! 
The room has one full size bed. If you want to add 3rd or 4th guest in the reservation I could add 1 extra air mattress with no extra fee if the reservation is set for 3 or 4. If the reservation is for 2 and you’d like to have an extra air mattress we charge $15p/night and we provide air mattress and linens for it. the room will become smaller for luggage becase you will have two beds on it. This is a good option if you want to save even more money otherwise you can book two rooms! 
As most houses in United States this is not made with concrete so you will hear people walking or outside sounds. It doesn’t bother most of the guest but if you are a very light sleeper maybe you should choose an entire place. or have an earphone or something to block the sound. There will be security cameras ON in shared spaces only( living room, kitchen, hallways, entrance of the apartment, exits of the apartment).
house_rules:
No smoking( any kind)
No parties allowed at all.
Respect other Airbnb guests, belongings and other rooms.
After 9pm the place has to be quiet so people can rest. 
Checkout is by 10am.
No screaming at anytime.
If you bring anybody please inform us before.
There is video recording in common areas for your own security.
booking for somebody else is not allowed unless agreed before booking
Breaking any rule or doing any illegal activity will end up in a immediate cancellation of your reservation and you will have to leave the place immediately. Our top one priority is our guests’ security! There will be security cameras ON in shared spaces only( living room, kitchen, hallways, entrance of the apartment, exits of the apartment).

access: Free use of washer/dryer. Use of all common areas such as garage, dinning room, kitchen, and family room. Nice backyard!
description:
The house is located near major highways. Because of its location, you’ll have easy access to the airport and other places. Many public transportations are nearby. The house is within walking distance of many different stores. It is in a safe and quiet neighborhood. The house has more than enough rooms to support multiple people. You can share two bathrooms with you and other guests in the house. You can use the garage, kitchen, and laundry machines whenever you want.

The house is clean, elegant, and large. It’s near multiple major highways for easy access to the airport and Chicago. There are many stores around the area. The house has a nice kitchen, a comfortable living room, and a beautiful backyard.

Free use of washer/dryer. Use of all common areas such as garage, dinning room, kitchen, and family room. Nice backyard!

We are always available via Airbnb chat.

The house is in a tranquil and quiet neighborhood. The people are very nice. There are many stores located around the neighborhood.

1、Driving is the best mean of transportation.
It’s 25 minutes to O’Hare airport, 30 minutes to Chicago downtown. 33 minutes to Midway   airport. 
2、Use the public transportation.
It's (1.5 miles ) 30 minutes' walk from BNSF Metro station, 10 minutes by bike, and bus stations are nearby.

Noted that we live nearby and there might be other guests in the house.

additional_house_rules:
- Guests must have a picture on their profile and a government ID.

- You will be sharing my home with me and other guests. Please be respectful of me, my dog, my home, other guests and the rules that are in place. 

Common courtesy to clean up after yourself as this is a shared living environment 

NOTE:  PLEASE REVIEW the house manual, since you are expected to have reviewed that & my house rules and agree to them PRIOR to booking my place.

- After 10pm courtesy of keeping noise level to a minimum will be given by me and expected of guest(s) as well in the event either of us has an early start time or has to work the next day.

- Guests should at minimum please clean up after themselves (including but not limited to):  throwing out garbage when bedroom can is full in outside trash can; wiping off/drying vanity countertop after use, cleaning hair out of tub and drain trap, rinsing out tub after use (soap scum / hair) and rinse off and pick up bath mat from tub floor and hang on side to dry, put down toilet seat after use, etc. Basic courtesy for all staying on premise.

- Please NO Eating in the bedroom

- NO Smoking allowed in my home; there is a patio in the backyard available for that. 

- NO Excessive drinking and NO Parties allowed. Thank you for your consideration.

- NO firearms, other weapons or illegal substances of any kind allowed on premises.

-Please note host scent sensitivity listed in house manual (item #5) and  please refrain from or limit items that emit pungent smells when cooking. NO cooking after 8pm.

- Please just ask for things out of the norm as I would hope to be able to accommodate all requests although appreciate the courtesy of being asked first in case there is a reason why something may not be offered as part of your stay.

- Please wipe your feet and take off your shoes in the utility room.

- Thank you and Toby (dog) and I look forward to hosting you at our home!

access: Can use Kitchen, Bathroom as well as front porch patio and back patio.
description:
Enjoy this comfy, welcoming home with my dog Toby & I in the heart of this charming South suburb 30 mins. OUTSIDE OF Chicago. Enjoy great amenities while traveling for work or play. Walk to Metra station (to enjoy Chicago) limited on weekends. Great for couples, solo adventurers & business travelers. Great for med professionals : Christ, Palos, Little Co. of Mary Hospitals, Students: MVCC, Trinity Christian, St. Xavier; just 15 mins. from Midway Airport. Convenient to Parks, Shops & Restaurants.

These Private bedrooms offer a Queen size Bed and a Full size bed. Both beds feature a Spa Sensations Memory Foam Mattress (and a box spring) and 2 Gel Memory Foam Pillows and 2 Beautyrest Down Alternative Pillows available, which can accommodate up to two people in each room (for a total of 4), in the rooms you have rented. 

Enjoy the use of the following areas:
Shared Kitchen 
(note: there are some cooking limitations such as no cooking of onion, garlic, pesto or pungent odor foods and no cooking after 8pm, so please refer to house manual);
Shared Bathroom;
Front Porch Patio;
Back Patio with fire pit (please notify host BEFORE using - supervised); and
Street Parking available directly in FRONT of house

NOTE:  Outside Hose/water is NOT AVAILABLE for use.

Can use Kitchen, Bathroom as well as front porch patio and back patio.

I will be available to offer help throughout the stay.

Quiet, family friendly neighborhood.
Near Metra, Hospitals, Parks, Fitness Centers, Splash Park, Movie Theatre, Shopping Mall, Laundromat, Restaurants and close transportation:
Metra Train to Chicago, Pace Bus Service, and 15 minutes to Midway Airport. 

Great for Medical professionals close to: Christ Hospital / Palos Community Hospital / Little Co. of Mary Hospital

Great for students or parents visiting students at nearby schools/ colleges: MVCC / Trinity Christian / St. Xavier / Lewis University as well as several others nearby.

Neighborhood Parks, Malls, Restaurants & Bars
Wolfe Wildlife Refuge with paved walking trail
Lake Katherine Waterfall Park with wood chips walking trail 
Train to Downtown Chicago
Close to several major hospitals, colleges and two universities

UBER or LYFT or private taxi service is available.  

Public Transportation within a couple of blocks walking distance:  

Train:  SW Service Metra Service (Downtown Chicago to Manhattan) Chicago Ridge Station within walking distance from home (schedule in photos) although it is very limited on weekends, but there is the Orange Line that is just 15 mins away. 

Pace Bus Service: 
6 Connecting Routes Service Chicago Ridge
Route 384 (comes from Midway Airport)
Route 385 (comes from Midway Airport and goes to Moraine Valley Valley Comm College) 
Both Pace Routes 384 & 385 are within walking distance to home and connect to other Routes (maps in photos)

Guests MUST have photo on profile in order for me to know who will be staying.  For Extra guests, please message a photo through AirBNB messenger so again I can see all persons that will be staying. 

My dog, Toby is a Jack Russell & Daschund mix - very friendly therapy dog who barks, smiles and sneezes on command. Don’t mistake his “smile” for a snarl as you’ll notice there will be no sound when he shows his pearly whites as it’s definitely a smile !

Towel/hand towel/wash cloth, Bedding, Linens and pillows included. Please be respectful when using towels and bed linens, etc. as any damages to towels, linens (or any other household item) due to makeup, oily hair products, or oily lotions will be taken out of the security deposit for replacement or reimbursement for additional cleaning that was required to bring item back to acceptable condition.

In both Bedrooms there is a small TV with basic cable, DVD & VCR included along with Internet access. 

Although In the Full Size Bed Bedroom there is a free standing Closet with shelves and hangers available for use as the Main closet in the room is unavailable. Thank you for cooperation with non-use.

- Please NO Eating in the bedroom

- NO Smoking allowed in my home; there is a patio in the backyard available for that. 

- NO Excessive drinking and NO Parties allowed. Thank you for your consideration.

- NO firearms, other weapons or illegal substances of any kind allowed on premises.

-Please note host scent sensitivity listed in house manual (item #5) and  please refrain from or limit items that emit pungent smells when cooking. NO cooking after 8pm.

- Please just ask for things out of the norm as I would hope to be able to accommodate all requests although appreciate the courtesy of being asked first in case there is a reason why something may not be offered as part of your stay.

- Please wipe your feet and take off your shoes in the utility room.

- Thank you and Toby (dog) and I look forward to hosting you at our home!
interaction: I will be available to offer help throughout the stay.
neighborhood_overview:
Quiet, family friendly neighborhood.
Near Metra, Hospitals, Parks, Fitness Centers, Splash Park, Movie Theatre, Shopping Mall, Laundromat, Restaurants and close transportation:
Metra Train to Chicago, Pace Bus Service, and 15 minutes to Midway Airport. 

Great for Medical professionals close to: Christ Hospital / Palos Community Hospital / Little Co. of Mary Hospital

Great for students or parents visiting students at nearby schools/ colleges: MVCC / Trinity Christian / St. Xavier / Lewis University as well as several others nearby.

Neighborhood Parks, Malls, Restaurants & Bars
Wolfe Wildlife Refuge with paved walking trail
Lake Katherine Waterfall Park with wood chips walking trail 
Train to Downtown Chicago
Close to several major hospitals, colleges and two universities
notes:
Guests MUST have photo on profile in order for me to know who will be staying.  For Extra guests, please message a photo through AirBNB messenger so again I can see all persons that will be staying. 

My dog, Toby is a Jack Russell & Daschund mix - very friendly therapy dog who barks, smiles and sneezes on command. Don’t mistake his “smile” for a snarl as you’ll notice there will be no sound when he shows his pearly whites as it’s definitely a smile !

Towel/hand towel/wash cloth, Bedding, Linens and pillows included. Please be respectful when using towels and bed linens, etc. as any damages to towels, linens (or any other household item) due to makeup, oily hair products, or oily lotions will be taken out of the security deposit for replacement or reimbursement for additional cleaning that was required to bring item back to acceptable condition.

In both Bedrooms there is a small TV with basic cable, DVD & VCR included along with Internet access. 

Although In the Full Size Bed Bedroom there is a free standing Closet with shelves and hangers available for use as the Main closet in the room is unavailable. Thank you for cooperation with non-use.
summary: Enjoy this comfy, welcoming home with my dog Toby & I in the heart of this charming South suburb 30 mins. OUTSIDE OF Chicago. Enjoy great amenities while traveling for work or play. Walk to Metra station (to enjoy Chicago) limited on weekends. Great for couples, solo adventurers & business travelers. Great for med professionals : Christ, Palos, Little Co. of Mary Hospitals, Students: MVCC, Trinity Christian, St. Xavier; just 15 mins. from Midway Airport. Convenient to Parks, Shops & Restaurants.
transit:
UBER or LYFT or private taxi service is available.  

Public Transportation within a couple of blocks walking distance:  

Train:  SW Service Metra Service (Downtown Chicago to Manhattan) Chicago Ridge Station within walking distance from home (schedule in photos) although it is very limited on weekends, but there is the Orange Line that is just 15 mins away. 

Pace Bus Service: 
6 Connecting Routes Service Chicago Ridge
Route 384 (comes from Midway Airport)
Route 385 (comes from Midway Airport and goes to Moraine Valley Valley Comm College) 
Both Pace Routes 384 & 385 are within walking distance to home and connect to other Routes (maps in photos)

access: The entire apartment is yours. This is your home away from home. Dishes, cook ware and other amenities are yours to use.
description:
Entire apartment is yours. Conveniently 400' from Red line Train, 50' away from 4 bus routes and a block away from the expressway.  15 min train ride to downtown, Michigan Ave, White Sox Park, Bears Stadium, Millennium Park, Musuems and more. McDonalds is across the street and subway is also nearby.

You have wifi within the apartment but if you want to head over to Kusanya Cafe’ at 825 W. 69th St, and get to know some of the folks or get some work done, its a big part of our community.

Guest love the simi private entryway, only two apartments. There’s a small deck to sit and have a cup of coffee, glass of wine, read a book or listen to music when weather permits. The suite is a nice bright spacious living space.

The entire apartment is yours. This is your home away from home. Dishes, cook ware and other amenities are yours to use.

I love meeting and greeting my guest. Whenever possible I will be available to meet you upon arrival. No worries if that can’t happen. There is a key box for you to access key to suite.
Please know that I’m always a phone call or text away and available if needed.

The suite is one train ride away from White Sox Park, Soldier Field Bears Stadium, Michigan Ave, and Millennium Park,

It’s best to hop on train just across the street and go to many of the tourist areas in Chicago. Lyft and Uber are always a great way to get from one destination to another. 

There is free street parking in front of the building, sometimes difficult to park before 5pm because people park and take train to work. No problem after 5pm. There is parking on the lot on the west end of the property on a 1st come basis.

description:
**PLEASE, NO INQUIRIES FOR PARTIES/EVENTS THIS IS A BOOKING FOR 1-4 GUESTS ONLY**

Beautiful Suburban entire private suite right outside of Chicago. Private entry, private bathroom, and private living room and kitchenette. Access to pool and gym!

This is a private suite, with private entry located in the basement of the home. This is your own private space with a common/living room area with huge 60 inch smart tv, wifi, cable, a kitchenette, and access to gym and large swimming pool, beautiful backyard with patio and walkable bridge and small creek. Lots of greenery, quiet safe neighborhood. Walking distance to quick bites, coffee, fast foods, and convenient stores.

You will have full access to your own private area. Host will be accessible to meet your needs, but will grant you your privacy during your stay.

This is a suburban neighborhood in a subdivision community. Lots of greenery and scenic streets. Short walking distance to food and necessities.

Public transportation is limited but available as this is a suburban area. Close proximity to the train that will take you directly to downtown Chicago. The city of Chicago is about 35 minute drive or uber ride. Ideally you could uber to the metra electric train and shoot directly downtown.

This is your own private space with a common/living room area with huge 60 inch smart tv, wifi, cable, a kitchenette, and access to gym and large swimming pool, beautiful backyard with patio and walkable bridge and small creek. Lots of greenery, quiet safe neighborhood. Walking distance to quick bites, coffee, fast foods, and convenient stores.
summary:
**PLEASE, NO INQUIRIES FOR PARTIES/EVENTS THIS IS A BOOKING FOR 1-4 GUESTS ONLY**

Beautiful Suburban entire private suite right outside of Chicago. Private entry, private bathroom, and private living room and kitchenette. Access to pool and gym!
transit: Public transportation is limited but available as this is a suburban area. Close proximity to the train that will take you directly to downtown Chicago. The city of Chicago is about 35 minute drive or uber ride. Ideally you could uber to the metra electric train and shoot directly downtown.

access: Except for the owners bedroom and bathroom, guests have access to pretty much the whole house.
description:
Our warm and inviting home is located in historic Oak Park, home of Frank Lloyd Wright and Ernest Hemingway.  The green line will whisk you to the center of Chicago in 25 minutes and it is less than three blocks from our front door.

Bedroom and bathroom are upstairs.
We charge $25 per person in an additional bedroom.
No pets.

Except for the owners bedroom and bathroom, guests have access to pretty much the whole house.

We are an international family and love to meet people from anywhere.

Our neighborhood is made up of almost entirely single family homes. We are
within walking distance (a few blocks) of restaurants and transportation.

We are 2 blocks from a bus stop and 3 blocks from a green line  Oak Park station which can take you to downtown Chicago in 20 minutes.

For an additional$25 we are able to pick up or drop off guests from either Chicago airports (O'Hare or Midway).

description:
Located in heart of River Nort. Come home to premium catering style kitchens with stainless steel appliances. Unwind after a long day in your very own relaxing soaking tubs, and take in beautiful and breathtaking city views. Enjoy premium shopping, dining, and nightlife at your doorstep. You can enjoy all that the greater Chicago area has to offer. Laundry room in the building. Monthly parking available at extra charge.

Managed by Corporate Housing Company Prestige Suites.

STRIKING DESIGN, SUITABLE CONVENIENCE – RIVER NORTH PARK IS AN OPPORTUNITY TO PURSUE
Hitting a new note of desirability amongst a buzzing Chicago scene, River North Park is primed to carry on a conversation of elevated Windy City living. 

Channeling a modern muse, these studio, one, and two-bedroom apartment homes are trending toward an unmatched level of refinement. With a thoughtful redesign in action, this Chicago community is in the process of welcoming the artistic nature of its River North neighborhood inside – from the trend-setting lobby to thoughtfully architected amenities. 

Simply put, you’re on the edge of a prime opportunity. River North is a chic canvas for those that seek a modern lifestyle, without venturing outside the unique character Chicago presents. This concept flows through each immaculately executed apartment home, which now offer residents sleek fixtures with sophisticated finishes. Whether it’s access to high-end retailers or a menu of foodie craved dining options, a metropolitan edge mixes and mingles with the renowned River North neighborhood this community calls home. 

Strike up a conversation with River North Park, and open the doors to the new era of luxury living being pursued. We’re offering an insiders look at these redesigned apartment homes, as well as a peek at the red carpet of updates continuously rolling out over the next year.

access: Guests will have access to the entire premises save the master bedroom/bathroom suite. There is a lovely patio behind the building (alley access) that includes a propane grill, also available for guest use. Guests are welcome to use kitchen appliances,  dishes,  condiments,  and dish and laundry soaps.
description:
Enjoy all the comforts of home including a relaxing patio with gas grill, fire pit, and nighttime lighting - all just 3 miles west of downtown chicago! Directly on bus line 72 and nearby to blue and brown line trains.

One bedroom and bathroom are private, though not en suite,  no one else will use it. The bathroom will be all yours for the duration of your stay.  If there are more guests in your party, there is a comfortable queen size sofa bed and a twin air mattress as well. The air mattress can be used in the living room area or in the private bedroom.

Guests will have access to the entire premises save the master bedroom/bathroom suite. There is a lovely patio behind the building (alley access) that includes a propane grill, also available for guest use. Guests are welcome to use kitchen appliances,  dishes,  condiments,  and dish and laundry soaps.

There is usually someone on premise, as I work from home.  Still,  guests will be left largely to themselves.  We tend to mirror guests as far as level of interaction is concerned and can be as friendly or as reserved as called for. That said, we are always available and happy to answer questions.

According to niche.com: Humboldt Park is a neighborhood in Chicago, Illinois with a population of 72,038. Humboldt Park is in Cook County. Living in Humboldt Park offers residents an urban suburban mix feel and most residents rent their homes. In Humboldt Park there are a lot of bars, restaurants, coffee shops, and parks. Many families and young professionals live in Humboldt Park and residents tend to be liberal.

Buses,  trains, bicycle rental kiosks, and car2go are all nearby. There is never a long wait for uber/lyft.

We have a cat named Frances who is very friendly and who can be shared or kept in the Master Suite depending on guest preference.  Small dogs are welcome but Frances will not abide another cat.  Apologies.

additional_house_rules:
• Treat the property and our neighbors with respect. 

• Absolutely no smoking in the house.

• Try to be quiet after 9PM. 

• pets not allowed Security deposit will be surrendered in full if animals are brought in the home. 

• Laundry facilities are available on-site, but on a rotating weekly schedule that has some flexibility. Please coordinate access to the laundry facilities with host.

• Please leave the apartment in the shape that you found it. 

• Please shut any windows if there is a chance of rain as it can get inside and will require costly cleanup.

• Relax and enjoy!

access:
I'll probably by home to welcome you.  If not, keys will be left in the lockbox for you to let yourself in and make yourselves at home.

Feel free to make yourselves at home in the kitchen, dining room, and living room.
description:
I'd love to host you in my spare bedroom(s).  Upon request, I can also make available a 2nd, smaller bedroom with twin size bed for a $20/night.

A short walk to the El and Metra, he apartment is located conveniently between downtown and O'Hare. Free street parking.

Put a pin on the world map marking all the places guests have visited from!

The hardwood floors are lovely, but also a little noisy. They are 100 years old... If your feet make noise, it doesn't bother me.

You'll have access to the entire apartment, except the host's bedroom.  There's a nice, large living room, and dining room you are welcome to enjoy the food you cook in the kitchen.  

WIFI is available throughout the apartment.

Some additions since the pictures were taken: I now have a large TV and a big glass coffee table in the living room.  The guest bedroom now has a dresser not shown in the photo.  The smaller bedroom now has a new bed and linens.

Towels are provided for guests, and iron and hair dryer are available in the dresser.

I'll probably by home to welcome you.  If not, keys will be left in the lockbox for you to let yourself in and make yourselves at home.

Feel free to make yourselves at home in the kitchen, dining room, and living room.

I'm not always home, but feel free to call, email or text me at any time.

Old Irving Park is a historic, family neighborhood with quiet, tree-lined streets and friendly neighbors.  There are a number of local establishments (including 2 new breweries) within walking distance, as well as the obligatory Starbucks.
The neighborhood is really ideal for anyone flying in from O'Hare airport wanting quick access to downtown.

I walk fast and get to the Blue Line in 10 minutes.  For those who like to take their time, it may take 15 minutes.  If you time it right, you can catch the Irving Park bus and be at the Blue Line a lot quicker.   
There are 2 Metra rail lines within walking distance which can get you downtown in 12 minutes.  They are less frequent than the El, but run on a reliable schedule.
There is plenty of free parking on the street.  Nobody has ever had trouble parking.

People have mentioned the squeaky floors as a minor annoyance.
house_rules:
• Treat the property and our neighbors with respect. 

• Absolutely no smoking in the house.

• Try to be quiet after 9PM. 

• pets not allowed Security deposit will be surrendered in full if animals are brought in the home. 

• Laundry facilities are available on-site, but on a rotating weekly schedule that has some flexibility. Please coordinate access to the laundry facilities with host.

• Please leave the apartment in the shape that you found it. 

• Please shut any windows if there is a chance of rain as it can get inside and will require costly cleanup.

• Relax and enjoy!
interaction: I'm not always home, but feel free to call, email or text me at any time.

The neighborhood is really ideal for anyone flying in from O'Hare airport wanting quick access to downtown.
notes: People have mentioned the squeaky floors as a minor annoyance.

access: You'll have free reign of your room, the living room, kitchen, main bathroom, and the back porch. When I'm in town you'll be sharing the apartment with me (I have the master bedroom in the back of the unit); whenever I'm touring or out of town, you'll have free reign of the place though I do lock my bedroom when I'm gone.
description:
Stay in the green room of my modern 3 bed 2 bath on Chicago's West Side. Amenities include close proximity to the blue line, 125" projector TV, wifi, in unit laundry, modern kitchen and bathroom, plenty of space/privacy, and a fully functional DJ booth.

I am a touring DJ and this is where I live whenever I'm in town. I also occasionally work out of it, use it to throw afterparties, livestream music events, and host other touring DJ's when they are in town.

You'll have free reign of your room, the living room, kitchen, main bathroom, and the back porch. When I'm in town you'll be sharing the apartment with me (I have the master bedroom in the back of the unit); whenever I'm touring or out of town, you'll have free reign of the place though I do lock my bedroom when I'm gone.

On weekends I'm usually out partying but I have been known to have a quiet night in from time to time. If you need a party liason for the weekend, contact me in advance and I will be happy to point you in the right direction.

I have a big kid job during the week so I'm usually pretty busy. You're more than welcome to come home hammered during the week, just don't break anything and try to keep it down while I'm sleeping.

If you're looking to have a quiet/tame experience in Chicago, I have a pretty good grasp on all of the touristy things to do and will happily point you in the right direction. Or if you're just looking for a place to crash and don't need any help/interaction from me, that's fine too.

The neighborhood is on Chicago's west side. There is a gyro restaurant across the street along with a convenience store. If you walk a block south towards Taylor St. There are a number of shops and restaurants. There's also a Pete's Fresh Market 4 blocks north if you intend to grocery shop & cook during your stay.

From a public transit standpoint, the place is ideally situated a block and a half away from the blue line and/or can easily catch the western bus. Uber and Lyft are also viable options and this particular part of the city is very drive-able with parking easy to find.

There is ample parking on the street and I do have a private garage space as well. The Garage only has one opener, however, so I will typically only offer the parking space during extenuating circumstances

The room you'll be staying in is my Green Room. Its main function is to host other touring DJ's when they are in town, however if the room is available on a weekend, it means that I am probably not throwing parties while you're staying here. If in doubt, inquire before booking. The listing says no smoking, however you can smoke on the back deck on the condition that you close the sliding door behind you and use the ashtrays outside for cigarette butts.

From a security standpoint: Generally speaking, neighborhood is relatively safe. I've lived here for 2 years and have hosted roughly 300 guests; none of whom have ever had any issues. The house uses smart locks, has a security system featuring intrusion detection and CCTV cameras facing the street outside as well in the the common areas of the unit (kitchen area, the DJ booth, and my office). While I do my best to keep the unit safe and secure, it is always advised to be vigilant in any urban area.

Also note: Freshly washed linens are changed between each guest and a cleaning service comes to deep clean once a week. With that said, I am a single male in my early 30's who lives in the space full time. If you're expecting hotel quality cleaning, then stay in a hotel.

description:
This Unit is newly remodeled located on the back side of  a commercial building with its own private bathroom and shower along with a working fridge, Microwave, sink  and futon. It is a perfect location near the train station with plenty of Restaurants within walking distance. This is a studio inside an apartment unit, so please be aware that other tenants and people live in the building.

The space isn't very big but it has everything you need. I also have a noise policy, monday- Friday, tenants and guest must lower noise level at 10:30pm. Weekends you reserve the right to noise until 12:00am.

I will be available at any time needed.

The neighborhood is an up and coming place filled with lots of restaurants and places to explore, it’s a very artistic influences neighborhood with lots of bars along the Main Street (18th street)

The location is 2 blocks away from the pink line train station, which the pink line will take you directly to downtown where Millenium park is located and other Chicago attractions. From the studio to downtown, it’s about a 15 min car ride (12$-15$uber, sometimes cheaper depending on the day).  from the studio to Chinatown, another famous area in Chicago, is about a 13min car ride (9$-12$ uber ride), from the studio to Wriggleyville, another famous area in Chicago known for all things CHICAGO CUBS, it’ll be about a 30 min car ride (23$-30$) sometimes cheaper uber car ride.

Parking: Their is plenty of street parking on the side by the park. In some occasions i may allow guest to park in my own personal parking lot.
interaction: I will be available at any time needed.

additional_house_rules:
+ No parties or events.
+ No loud music. 
+ No shoes inside.  
+ No unaccounted for guests. 

House Rules

1. All bookings require a security deposit of $500. You will not be charged for this in advance.

2. Strict Cancellation: For a full refund of accommodation fees, cancellation must be made within 48 hours of booking and at least 14 full days prior to listing’s local check-in time (or 3:00 PM if not specified) on the day of check-in.

3. Check-in time is any time after 3pm. Check-out time is any time before 11 am. You're welcome to request an early check in or late checkout, but this is not guaranteed and we can only confirm 24 hours in advance.

4. We do not allow smoking; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine.

5. All of our locations do not allow pets.

6. Parties or excessive noise are not allowed in our locations. Quite hours art after 10pm.

7. If a location is left in an exceptionally messy state, we will charge $50 for every extra hour of cleaning required.

8. Guests take full responsibility for any accidents, injuries, or illnesses that occur while on the premises or its facilities. By accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use of the premises. Guests recognize that they may personally purchase insurance to protect themselves in such events.

9. If more guests sleep at a location than the number originally stated in the booking, the security deposit will be charged in full.

10. If you notice anything that presents a danger that could result in damage to the location or to any individuals, let us know immediately.

11. This property may use Noiseware technology to ensure the comfort and security of our guests.

12. Any signs of glitter, sparkles or such substances will have an extra charge of $50 for cleaning. 

13. If guests delay the cleaners from beginning their cleaning at the predetermined check-out time, guests will be charged $50. This fee is applied to any late checkout between 11 am and 1 pm. Any guest who is still in the location after 1 pm will be charged for an extra night. This does not apply if our team has approved a late checkout in advance.

14. When you make a reservation with us, you are agreeing to all of the above House Rules.

description:
This clean and spacious 2nd floor (about 40 stairs) walk up two bedroom apartment is located in the heart of Chicago. It's close to the best shopping, restaurants, art galleries & museums the city has to offer!

+Have 4 listings in the same building- each accommodates 5  or 6 people.

+Location: Oak Street and Orleans Street. 
View on Google Maps before booking if you are unfamiliar with the area!

+Located 1/2 block from L Train (passes through) please note if you're a light sleeper!

This sun drenched and spacious apartment overlooks the city skyline making the open kitchen and living room a great communal living space. The apartment has a front and back entrance, along with a patio area where guests can enjoy their morning coffee, get some fresh air and relax.

This urban, modern and spacious apartment is a great place for big and small groups. There are two bedrooms (queen and full bed), a living area equipped for an extra guest, one bathroom, a washer/dryer (in unit), and fully equipped kitchen. Flat screen TV with Amazon Fire TV and complementary Wifi. 

*PLEASE NOTE: We do not have cable but we do have AMAZON FIRE STICK (4,000 channels, apps and games) 

+ FREE STREET PARKING located in the back of the building on first come first serve basis OR paid metered parking per hour OR garage parking a few blocks away on Chesnut Street. 

+ Located 1/2 block from L Train so please note if you're a light sleeper!

+ 15 minute walk to Oak Street Beach or 7 minutes by car 
+ 10 minute walk to Oak Street Shopping 
+ 8 minute walk to Jewel- Osco (grocery store)

The apartment is located in Downtown, Chicago. It is near Cabrini Green (no longer existing) and Near North Side districts, and as seen on the map below, in the River North area. There is a very prestigious high school (Walter Payton College Prep) across the street, town homes with young families and popular cafes and restaurants (Big and Little's) in the neighborhood. 

It's the place to be! Formerly home to many factories, it's modern mix of high-rises and historical buildings adds to the neighborhood's eccentric feel. You can find some of the most popular restaurants, dive bars, lounges (nightclubs), jazz clubs and art galleries here. The area is ideal for a traveller. The apartment is near all major shopping and nightlife streets, while also being walking distance from Lake Michigan.

Places to see: 
+ Navy Pier 
+ Lookingglass Theatre 
+ Merchandise Mart 
+ Headquarters Beercade River North 
+ Museum of Contemporary Art 
+ House of Blues 
+ Blue Chicago 
+ Wateriders Kayak Tours 
+ Museum of Broadcast Communications 
+ Chicago Shakespeare Theatre 
+ The Comedy Bar 
+ Lucky Strike Lanes 
+ FTW Chicago 
+ Underground Wonder Bar

Public transport is very accessible. 5 minute walk to the Red Line and 7 minute walk to the Brown Line CTA. There is a bus stop on the corner and many other lines (train, bus, city bikes) can be reached by foot in under seven minutes.

Early check in fee of $30 between hours of 12am- 10am.

description:
Conveniently located 10-15 min from downtown, Navy Pier, Shedd Aquarium,  Millennium Park, Soldier Field,  McCormick Place, & two blocks from Thalia Hall. Also blocks from the fire department apartment featured on the TV show Chicago Fire.  TWO bedrooms, living room (with sofa bed), dining room, and fully stocked kitchen.  The bus stop is around the corner. Street parking near.  Early check-in/late check-out sometimes possible. Check out my other listings! Dates are booking fast!

First floor. Full kitchen, living room, dining room, and two bedrooms.  A twin size bed in bedroom 1 and bunk beds (one full size, twin the other) in bedroom 2. There is also a sofa bed in the living room!
